name: Gravity Scale (Olivia)
description:
Hey there we had a lot of fun making this game, its made by 

Olivia [ aesthetic#8025 ] and  ~cj does stuff~ [ cj#5364 ]

Controls are simple use arrows to move and down arrow key to toggle gravity :)

pls give ur feedback on this game [ psst its my first game]

Stuff Used to make this:-

  •  Godot Engine - https://godotengine.org/
  •  Paint - for making sprites
